DOC.brief_summary: Determine if the pattern of voiding differs in children with vesicoureteral reflux (VUR) compared to those who do not have VUR.
DOC.brief_title: Determination of Voiding Patterns of Children With Vesicoureteral Reflux
DOC.detailed_description: We hope to determine the statistical difference between the flow rate and volume of urination in children with VUR compared to those without.
DOC.criteria: Children with or without vesicoureteral reflux (history of VUR) Toilet trained and can void on command Any voiding disorder, musculoskeletal neurologic disorders, other congenital or acquired genitourinary problems, growth disorders, recent UTI
